verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy is the Lamb/Thank You for the Cross Thank You for the cross Lord Thank You for the price You paid Bearing all my sin and shame In love You came and gave amazing grace Thank You for this love Lord Thank You for the nail pierced hands Washed me in the cleansing flow Now all I know Your forgiveness and embrace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy is the Lamb Seated on the throne Crown You now with many crowns You reign victorious High and lifted up Jesus Son of God The Treasure of Heaven crucified Worthy is the Lamb Worthy is the Lamb{/lang-eng}
